description: Veliki is a newly discovered, massive supernova remnant in the Large Magellanic Cloud, observed through a global collaboration using multiwavelength astronomy tools. Estimated to be 45,000 years old, Veliki showcases complex shell structures and highly unusual radio properties.
title: Astronomers Discover a Gigantic Supernova Remnant in the Large Magellanic Cloud

description: Written and directed by Paul W. S. Anderson, In The Lost Lands is an action-fantasy film that stars Milla Jovovich and Dave Bautista in the lead roles. The movie revolves around the journey of the duo in the lost lands, where they have to find magical power while fighting demons. Streaming soon.
title: In The Lost Lands OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Japan concluded the H-2A rocket program with the launch of the GOSAT-GW satellite, dedicated to monitoring greenhouse gases and sea temperatures. The mission strengthens Japan’s long-term commitment to climate research and marks a transition to the more cost-effective H3 launch system. Over its 25-year lifespan, H-2A recorded 49 successes out of 50 launches.
title: Japan Launches Final H-2A Rocket with GOSAT-GW Satellite to Monitor Climate and Oceans

description: Nothing Headphone 1 feature 40mm dynamic drivers, up to 42dB ANC with transparency mode, and KEF-tuned audio. The headphones support Bluetooth 5.3, dual-device connectivity, and AAC, SBC, and LDAC codecs. Equipped with a 1,040mAh battery, it is said to attain a full charge in 120 minutes via a USB Type-C port. The Headphone 1 are claimed to offer up to 80 hours of battery life on a single charge when using the AAC codec with ANC disabled.
title: Nothing Headphone 1 Launched in India With Up to 80 Hours of Battery Life, Transparent Design

description: Nothing Phone 3 has been launched as a direct competition to high-end Samsung and Apple devices. At a starting price of Rs. 79,999, it appeals to premium customers and packs a good set of features. The all-new Glyph Interface is the highlight of the new device, making it truly unique. It is powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 8S Gen 4 and comes in two RAM and storage variants. On the camera front, it packs a triple rear camera setup. Here are our first impressions.
title: Nothing Phone 3 First Impressions

description: Nothing Phone 3 has been launched in India with the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chipset. It packs up to 16GB of RAM and up to 512GB of storage. The phone features a triple rear camera unit, including three 50-megapixel sensors and a 50-megapixel selfie camera. It gets a new Glyph Matrix interface on the rear panel that can show notifications, animations, time, and more.
title: Nothing Phone 3 Launched in India With Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC, Glyph Matrix: Price, Specifications

description: SpaceX continues its rapid Starlink expansion with two Falcon 9 launches on June 28, 2025, delivering 53 satellites to orbit. With over 7,900 active units now in its constellation, SpaceX strengthens its lead in global LEO broadband service. The reusable boosters also landed successfully, marking their fifth and eighth flights.
title: SpaceX Expands Starlink Network with Dual Falcon 9 Launches, Boosts Constellation Beyond 7,900 Satellites

description: The Brutalist is all set to stream on Jio Hotstar. It is when Laszlo Toth and his wife fly to the USA to start his career and life over. A rich man named Harrison Lee Van Buren notices his talent and offers him a project. When Laszlo is in Pennsylvania as an immigrant, he is made to pay a very high price to protect his dignity and power; what he chooses is something viewers should only watch and understand.
title: The Brutalist Now Available for Streaming on JioHotstar: Everything You Need to Know

description: Directed by Victoria Mahoney, The Old Guard 2 is an American fantasy thriller that stars Charlize Theron in the lead role. Post losing her immortality in the previous part, she returns in this sequel to fight the immortals who have been threatening existence. Streaming soon.
title: The Old Guard 2 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch It Online?

description: Meta Superintelligence Labs (MSL) was reportedly created by the company CEO, Mark Zuckerberg, on Monday. As per multiple reports, the new group was created as a part of the restructuring of the existing Meta AI division. The MSL group is now said to be heading the division with a focus on developing the next generation of large language models (LLMs) and artificial intelligence (AI) technology for the company.
title: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg Reportedly Restructures AI Division, Creates Meta Superintelligence Labs

description: Baidu released the Ernie 4.5 series of artificial intelligence (AI) models in open-source on Monday. The Chinese tech giant had previously said that it would make its proprietary large language models (LLMs) available to the open community on July 31. It has now released 10 different variants of the series, with each of the models built on Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) architecture.
title: Baidu Releases Ernie 4.5 Series AI Models in Open-Source, Offers Multi-Hardware Toolkits

description: US District Judge Julien Neals in Newark, New Jersey, denied Apple's motion to dismiss the lawsuit accusing the company of using restrictions on third-party app and device developers to keep users from switching to competitors and unlawfully dominate the market.
title: Apple Loses Bid to Dismiss US Smartphone Monopoly Case

description: A spokesperson for OpenAI said on Sunday that while the AI lab is in early testing with some of Google's tensor processing units (TPUs), it has no plans to deploy them at scale right now.
title: OpenAI Says It Has No Plan to Use Google's In-House Chip

description: Sony has raised the price of the digital edition PS5 in India by Rs. 5,000. The Shop at SC website now reflects the raised price of the console. The price of the standard PS5, however, remains the same.
title: PS5 Digital Edition Price Hiked in India: Here's How Much It Costs Now

description: After releasing three models each in its Xiaomi 14 and 15 series, the company may expand to four devices in this year’s numbered lineup. The new addition is expected to be the Xiaomi 16 Pro Mini, a more compact variant that aligns with the growing trend of smaller flagship models among Chinese smartphone brands in 2025.
title: Xiaomi 16 Pro Mini With 6.3-Inch Display, Different Camera Layout Said to Be in Development

description: Vi announced its Guarantee Programme for 2G handset users on Tuesday. With Vi Guarantee, customers can avail 30 days of service validity instead of the usual 28 days with the recharge plan of Rs. 199 or more, allowing for just one recharge per month.
title: Vodafone Idea (Vi) Guarantee Programme Brings Extra Validity for 2G Users

description: OnePlus revealed that the Nord 5 handset will go on sale in India on July 9 at 12pm IST, while the Nord CE 5 will be available from July 12 at 12am IST via Amazon, the OnePlus website, and offline stores. The Nord CE 5 will get a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Apex chipset, a 7,100mAh battery with 80W fast charging support, and a 50-megapixel Sony LYT-600 primary rear sensor with OIS support.
title: OnePlus Nord CE 5 Key Specifications Revealed Ahead of July 8 Launch; Availability Confirmed

description: Microsoft researchers unveiled a new artificial intelligence (AI) system on Monday that can diagnose patients more accurately than human doctors. Dubbed the Microsoft AI Diagnostic Orchestrator (MAI-DxO), it is a system that includes multiple AI models and a framework that allows it to go through patient symptoms and their history to suggest relevant tests, and then, based on the results, it suggests possible diagnoses.
title: Microsoft’s AI System Claimed to Diagnose Patients More Accurately Than Doctors

description: The Honor Magic 8 series is expected to include smartphones with 6.3-inch, 6.58-inch, and 6.7-inch displays. The 6.58-inch model may be the base variant, possibly featuring a 64-megapixel OmniVision OV64B or a 50-megapixel Sony IMX882 periscope camera. The 6.7-inch version is likely the Magic 8 Pro with a 200-megapixel periscope shooter. The 6.3-inch model could be the Magic 8 Mini, expected to launch later. A Max variant with a 6.9-inch display may also join the lineup.
title: Honor Magic 8 Series Key Features Leaked; Lineup May Include Mini and Max Variants

description: A new leak suggests that a Redmi smartphone is in the works with a 6.8-inch flat display and a battery capacity of over 8,000mAh. While the leak doesn't suggest the name of the phone, it is speculated to be the Redmi Turbo 5 Pro. It’s also possible the leak refers to a successor to the Redmi Turbo 4 or the Redmi K80 Ultra.
title: Redmi Turbo 5 Pro Tipped to Feature a 6.8-Inch Display and 8,000mAh Battery

description: The Ministry of Railways launched the new RailOne superapp on Tuesday. The launch was flagged off by Minister of Railways Ashwini Vaishnaw. It is said to be a one-stop shop which consolidates the ministry’s public-facing services into a single platform, offering services such as reserved ticket booking, PNR enquiries, ticket refund requests, and ordering food on trains.
title: Indian Railways Launches RailOne App as a Unified Platform for Ticket Booking and Other Services

description: After facing allegations of generative AI use in its survival game The Alters, developer 11 Bit Studios has confirmed the instances where it did use artificial intelligence in the game. The studio said it would remove AI-generated content from the game in a future update.
title: The Alters Developer 11 Bit Studios Confirms It Used AI for Text, Translations in the Game

description: Google introduced several new offerings for students, educators, and schools on Monday. The announcements were made at the International Society for Technology in Education (ISTE) edtech conference, where the Mountain View-based tech giant announced Gemini in Classroom, a suite of more than 30 new AI tools for educators. The company also released a custom version of the Gemini app dubbed Gemini for Students.
title: Google Introduces 30 New AI Tools for Educators and Custom Gemini App for Students

description: The Samsung Galaxy M36 5G is loaded with an interesting set of features. The handset comes equipped with a lot of AI features, including Circle to Search, Gemini Live, AI Select, and more. The handset also gets a large display, a premium design, and decent specifications. Check out the first impressions to know more about the device.
title: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G First Impressions

description: Oppo Pad SE will launch in India on July 3 at 12pm IST alongside the Oppo Reno 14 5G series. It will be available in Starlight Silver and Twilight Blue shades with a dual-tone finish. The tablet features an 11-inch LCD Eye-Care display, a 9,340mAh battery with 33W SuperVOOC charging, and Smart Power Saving Mode offering up to 800 days of standby. It also includes TÜV Rheinland eye protection certifications and 36-month Fluency Protection, similar to its global counterpart.
title: Oppo Pad SE to Launch in India on July 3 Alongside the Reno 14 5G Series

description: Instagram has released a new feature which makes it easier to share songs with others on the platform, as per a report. Users can now share tracks on their Instagram Stories and they will appear with a preview of the song. While users could previously share tracks too, only the album cover appeared without any audio. This builds upon the recent rollout of another feature which allows sharing tracks from Spotify directly as Instagram Notes.
title: Instagram Now Lets You Share Songs From Spotify on Stories With Audio Preview

description: Redmi has launched a new Champagne Gold colour variant of the Redmi Note 14 Pro+ 5G and Redmi Note 14 Pro 5G in India. The handsets were launched in December last year in Spectre Blue, Phantom Purple, and Titan Black shades. The Note 14 Pro+ is equipped with a Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 SoC, whereas the Redmi Note 14 Pro gets a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultra chipset.
title: Redmi Note 14 Pro+ 5G, Note 14 Pro 5G Champagne Gold Colour Variant Launched in India

description: Samsung’s Galaxy S25 Edge finds itself in a really odd space, given that its own sibling, the Galaxy S25+, does more at a lower price tag. While Samsung has successfully managed to be the first to reignite the slim smartphone race, it has not put its best foot forward from a features standpoint, making it a weak offering against the other Galaxy S25 models this year.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Review: All Premium, Just Not Pro

description: Apple is reportedly ditching the idea of using in-house artificial intelligence (AI) models to power the new capabilities in Siri. As per the report, the Cupertino-based tech giant is now considering outsourcing the technology instead. The two main contenders for this are reportedly Anthropic and OpenAI, who have been asked to train a custom version of their AI model for Siri.
title: Apple Reportedly Considering Powering Siri Using Anthropic or OpenAI’s AI Models

description: Tecno Spark Go 2 is now available for purchase in India through Flipkart. The handset comes in four colourways and houses a 5,000mAh battery. It sports a 6.67-inch HD+ display with a 120Hz refresh rate. The Spark Go 2 is priced at Rs. 6,999 for the 4GB RAM + 64GB storage model.
title: Tecno Spark Go 2 Now on Sale in India: Price, Offers and Specifications

description: Samsung has commenced the rollout of the One UI 8 Watch Beta in select markets, according to a report. Initially released for the Galaxy Watch 7 and Galaxy Watch Ultra, it is based on the latest WearOS 6 OS for Android-powered wearables. The One UI 8 Watch Beta update reportedly adds Now Brief and Now Bar, two AI-backed features. There are also Antioxidant Index, Bedtime Guidance, and more features which Samsung announced as part of One UI 8 last month.
title: Samsung One UI 8 Watch Beta for Galaxy Watch 7, Watch Ultra Reportedly Rolling Out

description: The Poco F7 5G is available in India via Flipkart, priced at Rs. 31,999 for the 12GB + 256GB variant and Rs. 33,999 for the 12GB + 512GB variant. Buyers can avail an instant Rs. 2,000 discount using HDFC, SBI, or ICICI Bank cards, along with a Rs. 2,000 exchange offer. Benefits for the first day of sale include one-year screen damage protection worth Rs. 10,000 and an additional one-year warranty. The Poco F7 is sold in Cyber Silver Edition, Frost White, and Phantom Black colour options.
title: Poco F7 5G Now Available for Purchase in India: Price, Offers, and Specifications

description: Apple's iOS 26 update is set for release later this year, but a report indicates not all new capabilities will be available in Europe. Notably, users in the European Union may experience delays accessing these features, similar to how Apple Intelligence features were delayed in the EU after Apple faced regulatory hurdles.
title: Apple's iOS 26 Update Won't Offer Some Features in the EU at Launch: Report

description: Halo Studios announced last year that it was working on multiple Halo games. The developer has now said it will share an update on its projects later this year at Halo World Championship.
title: Halo Studios Will Share Update on Halo Games in Development in October

description: The demand for "dumb phones", basic handsets that prioritise essential communication over complex smartphone functions, is on the rise. These devices, ideal for a "digital detox," offer calling, texting, and access to useful apps like WhatsApp, at a more affordable price. While older feature phones running KaiOS can no longer run WhatsApp, here are some basic phones running Android that are popular secondary devices for those seeking simplicity without sacrificing access to WhatsApp.
title: Best Basic, No-Frills Mobile Phones With WhatsApp Support in 2025

description: Google's Pixel 10 series is expected to launch next month. Ahead of it, a new leak has surfaced suggesting all the hardware specifications of the Pixel 10 Pro and Pixel 10 Pro XL. The phones could run on a Tensor G5 processor with up to 16GB of RAM. They are likely to feature a 42-megapixel selfie camera. The Pixel 10 Pro phones could offer improvements in terms of battery and charging speed.
title: Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL Full Specifications Leaked; Said to Get Larger Batteries, Faster Charging

description: Motorola has confirmed that the Moto G96 5G will launch in India on July 9 at 12pm IST. It will be available via Flipkart in Ashleigh Blue, Dresden Blue, Cattleya Orchid, and Greener Pastures colour options. The phone will get a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 SoC, a 50-megapixel Sony Lytia 700C main rear sensor with OIS support and an IP68-rated build. It will sport a 6.67-inch 10-bit 3D curved pOLED display with a 144Hz refresh rate, 1,600 nits brightness, water touch support and Corning Gorilla Glass 5 protection.
title: Moto G96 5G India Launch Date Set for July 9; Colour Options, Key Features Revealed

description: Apple is said to have plans of introducing a more affordable version of its MacBook in the coming years. According to a seasoned industry analyst, the purported laptop will sport a compact display, similar to the current base-level MacBook Air. It will be powered by a flagship iPhone processor. The Cupertino-based tech giant reportedly expects to recover its shipment numbers to the pre-Covid-19 period, with the affordable MacBook anticipated to have a high share.
title: Apple to Launch a ‘More Affordable’ MacBook With a 13-inch Screen, A18 Pro SoC: Report

description: Samsung has released the latest One UI 8 Beta 3 for its flagship Galaxy S25 series, as per a tipster. The update is said to be rolling out in select markets. The update reportedly does not include any notable new features but carries only fixes for issues discovered in previous updates. A majority of the fixes in the latest Android 16-based beta update for the Galaxy S25 series is said to focus on bugs related to text input via the keyboard and S-Pen.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series One UI 8 Beta 3 With Bug Fixes Reportedly Live in the UK, Other Markets

description: Nothing Phone 3 is all set to make its debut in India and the global markets today, July 1. It is teased to arrive as the “first true flagship smartphone” from the UK-based company. In the days leading up to its launch, Nothing has been sharing a few details about the handset including its camera and processor. Here's everything you need to know.
title: Nothing Phone 3 Launching Today: Know Price, How to Watch Livestream, Expected Features and Specifications
